trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to create child objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> 类表示一种特定类型的访问规则，该规则用于允许或拒绝某个 Active Directory 域服务对象创建子对象的权限。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 指定访问规则类型的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference and access control type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标识引用和访问控制类型来初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor, it creates a create child access rule that applies to all child types.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用此构造函数，它会创建一个用于将应用到所有子类型创建子访问规则。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 指定访问规则类型的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> 枚举值之一，指定访问规则的继承类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标识引用、访问控制类型和 Active Directory 域服务安全继承信息来初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor, it creates a create child access rule that applies to all child types.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用此构造函数，它会创建一个用于将应用到所有子类型创建子访问规则。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 指定访问规则类型的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The schema GUID of the type of child objects that can or cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建或不能创建的子对象类型的架构 GUID。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />, then the access rule applies to all child types.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />，则该访问规则适用于所有子类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, and child object type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标识引用、访问控制类型和子对象类型来初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 指定访问规则类型的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> 枚举值之一，指定访问规则的继承类型。

trans-unit.source: The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
trans-unit.target: 可继承此访问规则的子对象类型的架构 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information, and inherited object type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标识引用、访问控制类型、Active Directory 域服务安全继承信息和继承对象类型来初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor, it creates a create child access rule that applies to all child types.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用此构造函数，它会创建一个用于将应用到所有子类型创建子访问规则。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 指定访问规则类型的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The schema GUID of the type of child objects that can or cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建或不能创建的子对象类型的架构 GUID。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />, then the access rule applies to all child types.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />，则该访问规则适用于所有子类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> 枚举值之一，指定访问规则的继承类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, child object type, and Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标识引用、访问控制类型、子对象类型和 Active Directory 域服务安全继承信息来初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> object that identifies the trustee of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference" /> 对象，标识访问规则的受信者。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> enumeration values that specifies the access rule type.
trans-unit.target: 指定访问规则类型的 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.AccessControlType" /> 枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The schema GUID of the type of child objects that can or cannot be created.
trans-unit.target: 可以创建或不能创建的子对象类型的架构 GUID。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />, then the access rule applies to all child types.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是 <see cref="F:System.Guid.Empty" />，则该访问规则适用于所有子类型。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> enumeration values that specifies the inheritance type of the access rule.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectorySecurityInheritance" /> 枚举值之一，指定访问规则的继承类型。

trans-unit.source: The schema GUID of the child object type that can inherit this access rule.
trans-unit.target: 可继承此访问规则的子对象类型的架构 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> class with the specified identity reference, access control type, child object type, Active Directory Domain Services security inheritance information, and inherited object type.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的标识引用、访问控制类型、子对象类型、Active Directory 域服务安全继承信息和继承对象类型来初始化 <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.CreateChildAccessRule" /> 类的新实例。
